item.title: Flight Crew Seat Manual Adjustment System – (Recline)

numlitem.para: Seat is secured in upright position and is acceptable to affected crewmember,
Fwd/Aft and vertical manual adjustment modes are operative, and
Repairs are made within two flight days.

placard.para: Placard near upper EICAS "______ SEAT RECLINE MODE INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Secure seat in upright position acceptable to crew member.
